data.title: Ensure that the 'Sign In' button is easy to see on every page of the website.
data.observation: The 'Sign In' button is located at the top right corner on both the main page and the login page. It is noticeable due to its color and position.
data.suggestions: No further suggestions needed as the button is already easy to spot.

data.title: Ensure that the 'Sign In' button is easy to see on every page of the website. It should always be in a clear and noticeable spot so users can easily find it no matter where they are on the site. Additionally, users should be able to sign in using a combination of their username or email and password.
data.observation: The 'Sign In' button is consistent and noticeable on all pages. Users sign in using their email and password, but there is no mention of allowing username for sign-in.
data.suggestions: Consider adding the option for users to sign in using either their email or username along with their password.

data.title: Ensure there is an accessible and straightforward process for users to recover forgotten passwords.
data.observation: There is a 'Forgot password?' link on the login page, which provides an accessible way for users to recover forgotten passwords.
data.suggestions: No further suggestions needed as the password recovery process is accessible and straightforward.

data.title: Ensure there is an accessible and straightforward process for users who have forgotten their email addresses.
data.observation: There is no visible option or process for users who have forgotten their email addresses.
data.suggestions: Include a clear option or link for users who have forgotten their email addresses, providing a step-by-step recovery process.

data.title: Ensure there is an option for users to 'Remember My Details'.
data.observation: The screenshots do not show an option for users to remember their login details.
data.suggestions: Implement a 'Remember My Details' checkbox on the login page to enhance user convenience.

data.title: Ensure the site features helpful error messaging that triggers only when fields are incorrectly input, ensuring users receive clear guidance to correct mistakes effectively.
data.observation: There is appropriate error messaging when an invalid email format is used. The message clearly specifies that the email is missing an '@'.
data.suggestions: No further suggestions needed as error messages provide clear guidance.

data.title: Ensure CAPTCHA or other anti-bot measures are implemented during sign-in to enhance security and prevent automated attacks, thereby safeguarding user accounts and maintaining the integrity of the login process.
data.observation: CAPTCHA or other anti-bot measures are not visible in the screenshots provided.
data.suggestions: If not yet implemented, it is recommended to add CAPTCHA or similar anti-bot measures to enhance security during sign-in.

data.title: Ensure that error messaging is clear and concise, providing users with specific reasons for the error encountered and clear instructions on the next steps to resolve the issue effectively. This approach enhances user understanding and facilitates smoother navigation and interaction on the site.
data.observation: The error message regarding the missing '@' in the email address is clear and concise, specifying the issue precisely.
data.suggestions: No further suggestions needed as error messaging enhances user understanding effectively.
